data.title: The PERFECT afternoon!!!
data.text:
YES!!!!!!! You have to go on one of their tours!!!!!!!

We were able to go on a tour with several of our friends. This was the second time we experienced an afternoon out with Cork and Barrel. . . and everything about the afternoon was wonderful! We learned so much, but had so much fun as a group! Lots of laughs, lots of amazing wine, many selfies, good snacks on the road, and we suggest you take a tour with them as soon as you can!!! You will be glad you did!

data.title: What a relaxing and wonderful experience!
data.text: We were able to spend the day with Cork and Barrel wine tours and what an amazing experience!  From the one on one attention, to the snacks, lunch and witty conversation, this is a MUST if you are toying with the idea of a wine tour.  Eric and Kim are not only a delight to be around, they are also very knowledgeable about wine and the wine making process.  I highly recommend this tour!!!

data.title: The Perfect Gift!
data.text:
I booked my mom a tour for 2 as a birthday gift.  I can't thank Kimberly enough for making my mom's birthday gift a royal treat for her!  My mom and her friend had an absolute blast!  Throughout the adventure, I got updates as they arrived at each winery.  Kimberly took them to 4 great wineries and the pace that they took was ideal for my mom and her friend.  I did not join the tour, but Kimberly made me feel as if I was just as much apart of it.  She sent me pics of my mom and her friend at each stop along the way, which made for a fun day for me too!  

My mom and her friend RAVED about their experience since going on the tour.  From the small details of snacks being available in the van to opening the doors for them and carrying their wine, the extras that Kimberly provided really made the tour even better for my mom and her friend.  

Kimberly, I can't thank you enough for making my mom's birthday gift special and fun!  The experience you created for them will forever be cherished!  I highly recommend your tour to EVERYONE!  5 Stars!

data.title: Awesome Tour!
data.text:
Kimberly is Awesome!!  My sister and a friend booked and afternoon tour while on our girl's only vacation.  I am so glad we did.  Kimberly is a delight.  Kimberly is knowledgable about the area's wines and you can tell she really enjoys her job. On our tour we stopped at Sarver Vineyards, LaVelle, Silvan Ridge, and Nobel.  We loved every minute of it. Highly recommend the using Cork and Barrel tours.  I would book another trip to Oregon just to do another tour with them again!

P.S.  They provide water and great snacks!

data.title: The best way to see Eugene's wine country
data.text:
I had two visitors in town, and they wanted to see what Eugene had to offer for wine. It is TOTALLY worth the price, especially with the three of us being young 20 and 30-somethings...no one wanted to be the Designated Driver.

Kim was an amazing host. The wineries took exceptional care of us once we arrived. Cork and Barrel made everything so logistically easy, and all we had to do was make sure we had wine in our glasses. I've been in Eugene for four years and this was by far the best winery experience I have had since moving here...maybe ever. 

I am looking for reasons to book another Cork and Barrel tour 1. because there are so many wineries to see and 2. to simply hang out with Kim again. She's a hoot!

data.title: PERFECT activity for family and friends
data.text: Wow. Wow. Wow. We had such an amazing time with Cork & Barrel, we can't wait to do this again!!! Eric & Kim are the PERFECT hosts, mixing their knowledge and skills with great humor and personality! The wine was incredible. We absolutely loved having someone drive us around, and between the gorgeous views, great wine, and time with our family- it was the perfect afternoon! If you are reading this review and haven't booked with them. . . you need to sign up as fast as you can!!!!!

data.title: Awesome Bachelorette Party!
data.text:
This was the perfect way to celebrate my friend getting married. Kimberly was a blast to work with and it was so much fun! 
Wine was great, scenery beautiful and just a great day! 
Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for something and want to do it again!

data.title: Cheers to a fabulous tour!
data.text: Where to start about this amazing tour. This was my first wine tour and what a great way to break in my first experience. Not only were the wineries amazing, the information we received from the guides was exceptional. Look no further for another tour, this is the only one you'll ever need! Thanks for such an amazing day, we are looking forward to our next adventure with Cork and Barrel.

data.title: Best wine tour, amazing owners and guides
data.text:
It's been a year since we took a wine tour with Cork and Barrel, and we still are finding ways to boast about our experience. Even talked a few people into an 8 hr drive just to experience the amazing wine, company, and hospitality that only Kim and Erik Wick know how to provide. 

Any time we are back in Eugene my wife and I will be seeking out a wine tour with the best in the business.

data.title: Fantastic Wine Tour!!
data.text: What an exceptional experience! There were five of us and Kimberly took us on a fabulous wine tasting tour of four local wineries, ending with a superb dinner at King Estates. Kimberly was an excellent & informed guide, her van was spacious and comfortable, and her interaction with each winery host was great. The weather was perfect, the views gorgeous, and the wines excellent. I would so recommend Cork & Barrel Tours to anyone, local or out of state. Thank you Kimberly!!

data.title: Such a great time with new friends!
data.text: This was our first wine tour & we had such a great time. Everything was planned by Cork and Barrel down to the to the tiniest of details. All we had to do was sit back & enjoy the experience. By the end of the trip we all had two new friends.

data.title: Cork & Barrel has the special touch!  Highly recommended!
data.text: We took a Cork & Barrel wine tour this last weekend with the owners, Eric & Kim.  We prearranged to be picked up at our hotel where we joined four other customers---- then we were quickly off on our fantastic adventure!  Our tour headed to the Dundee Hills area where we stopped at numerous wineries throughout the day.  Snacks were provided in the tour van after each stop which was a wonderful treat--- and a necessity!  The Willamette Valley is well known for it's pinot noir.  In fact, every winery we went to had at least one to try.  Not knowing too much about wine ourselves it was interesting to hear the different processes used to make the pinot noir grape taste so differently.  Eric & Kim knew everyone at all the wineries which meant we were all treated like old friends!  We were even at a winery that provided us wine the moment we stepped out of the tour van!  This kind of service is hard to come by in any business.  We felt Cork & Barrel had that "special touch"!  On the way home we were treated with a ride over the river on a cable ferry, which was a short but memorable experience!  Next time we are in Eugene we will definitely be booking another relaxing and enjoyable wine tour with Cork & Barrel!

data.title: Fantastic Wine Tour by Owner Kim Wick
data.text: If you are anywhere in the area of Eugene, Dundee, in and around these places in OR and interested in taking a wine tour, Cork and Barrel is the first place to start.  OMGoodness, Kim was very knowledgable of the various wineries in the area.  We visited 4 wineries the first day, and it was so much fun we decided to stop on our way back from Merlin Or for another fun wine tour with Cork and Barrel. Have been on many wine tours over the years but experienced the best in Eugene OR, with Kim.  Thank you Kim for an exceptional fun wine tour for two days:-). Next time in the area, I will book again.

data.title: Highlight of our trip
data.text:
My husband and I had an unexpected extra day in Eugene, Orgeon during our vacation and decided to see if it was possible to do a wine tour in the area.  I am so glad we found Cork and Barrel!  They were amazingly able to accommodate us on short notice and Kimberly (one of the owners, and our guide for the day) was so nice and so energetic and knew EVERYONE in wine in the area.  She and her husband obviously have a passion for what they are doing.  

Here's a short breakdown of what made this tour great:
1) We went to 4 different wineries, 2 of which were more "off of the beaten path".  We were asked ahead of time if there were any wineries in the area which we wanted to go see (we didn't, but if you have one on your list, they'll do their best to work it in). Iris and Sarver were our personal favorites
2) The company was fantastic!  Kimberly knows a lot about wine and the area, but she'll be the first to admit she's learning something new all the time.  Neither my husband nor I know a lot about wine, we came with 1,000 questions, and never once did we feel uncomfortable asking them
3) The price was reasonable, and came with all of the tasting fees covered and a mini-lunch of meats and cheeses (from a local company) to eat at a winery of our choice.  Yum!
4) No driving and lots of delicious wine.

data.title: A FUN tour!
data.text: Cork & Barrel make it special! From their knowledge of the vineyards and wines to the little extras like the snacks provided, Kim & Eric do it right. Our group enjoyed the welcoming atmosphere created from the very start. We'll be booking another trip in the future!
